name: Y-Love
description: '''Yitz Jordan''' (born January 5, 1978), better known by his stage name '''Y-Love''', is an American [[hip hop]] artist. An [[Orthodox Jew]], Jordan was formerly [[Hasidic]]. Jordan rhymes in a mixture of English, [[Hebrew]], [[Yiddish]], [[Arabic]], [[Latin]] and [[Aramaic]], often covering social, political and religious themes.
